Claim: "Four men on bikes serve as the focal point of the picture."
Implication: "Local robbers escape after stealing an otter."
Referring expressions: Four men, bikes, picture.  Local robbers, otter
Formula: (exists c (exists a (IsOnBikes(a) and IsFocalPointOf(c)))) -> (exists e (exists d (IsLocal(d) and IsStolen(e))))
